events: Found shoe prints leading off-road near the forest checkpost
Observed fresh broken pine twigs near Upper Aru Slope Trail
Encountered two individuals near Forest Shadow Zone
Individuals avoided the main trail when patrol approached
text_data.movement_direction: From Aru Road to Forest Checkpost

historical_context:
[Ref: text3.txt]: Patrol Report 2 – BRAVO Patrol (Aru Road → Forest Checkpoint)
Team ID: PT-BRAVO
Base: Pahalgam Army Camp (Aru Road Side)
Personnel: 5
Patrol Zone: Aru Road → Forest Checkpost → Upper Aru Slope
Patrol Time: 22 April, 09:30 AM – 11:50 AM
“Aru Road had moderate movement of taxis and pony operators.
At 10:35 AM, found shoe prints leading off-road near the forest checkpost.
Pattern deeper than civilian sports shoes; likely heavy-sole boots.
Fresh broken pine twigs near Upper Aru Slope Trail.
Area unusually quiet despite tourist season.”

[Ref: latest.txt]: Patrol Team Report #1 — ALPHA-21 (Morning Patrol)
Team ID: PT-ALPHA-21
Base: CRPF Camp Pahalgam
Patrol Zone: Pahalgam Town → Baisaran Entry Gate → Trail-1
Time: 22 April 2025, 08:40 AM – 11:05 AM
“Normal movement observed along tourist road.
At 10:12 AM, two individuals seen near Forest Shadow Zone (low signal area).
They avoided the main trail when patrol approached.

summary: A patrol report from the BRAVO team indicates unusual activity near the Forest Checkpost, including shoe prints and broken pine twigs, amidst a relatively quiet area despite the tourist season. The team observed moderate movement of taxis and pony operators along Aru Road.
